text: Chi Po-lin (December 27, 1964 - June 10, 2017) was a Taiwanese documentary filmmaker, photographer and environmentalist. He was best known for his 2013 movie Beyond Beauty: Taiwan from Above, which won Best Documentary at the 2013 Golden Horse Awards. He was born in Taipei. On June 10, 2017, Chi died in a helicopter crash in a mountainous area in Hualien County's Fengbin Township at the age of 52.
